[[A (Fourth Raikage)|A]] and [[Bee]] start their combo by using [[Cross Lariat]] to launch the opponent. Bee grabs ahold of the opponent's arms and waist, while Ay takes the legs; the team then link arms from a back-to-back position and drive their foe into the ground stomach-first.



[[pt-br:Bomba Liger dos Dois Pelotões]]
